title: Peter Fieber (footballer, born 1989)
text:
Peter Fieber Jr. (born 10 December 1989) is a <a href="Slovak%20people">Slovak</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for the <a href="3.%20Liga%20%28Slovakia%29">Slovak 3. liga</a> club <a href="OFK%20Dunajsk%C3%A1%20Lu%C5%BEn%C3%A1">Dunajská Lužná</a>. He has been with Lužná since 2012.
Club career.
Prior to signing professionally with <a href="FK%20Inter%20Bratislava">Bratislava</a> for the 2008—2009 season, he played on their youth teams. He moved to <a href="MFK%20Petr%C5%BEalka">Petržalka</a> after the season ended. While there, he played in the <a href="Slovak%20Super%20Liga">Corgoň League</a>, Slovakia's first division. After Petržalka, he transferred to <a href="Budapest%20Honv%C3%A9d%20FC">Honvéd</a> in <a href="Budapest">Budapest</a> on a 2.5 year contract, but left in 2011. In July 2011, he joined Slovak club <a href="FK%20LAFC%20Lu%C4%8Denec">FK LAFC Lučenec</a>, where he continues to play.
Personal life.
His father <a href="Peter%20Fieber">Peter Fieber</a> is a coach and retired football.
